body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gabriel White and the customer's name is Melissa Ramirez.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling TechSupport Solutions. My name is Maria. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Maria, I'm having trouble with my laptop. It won't start up properly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. For verification purposes, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: And can you also provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's six one seven five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Based on what you've described, it sounds like we might need to reset your laptop. Can you press and hold the power button for ten seconds?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Now try pressing the power button again to turn it on.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's starting up now. Thank you so much for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John! I'm glad we could resolve the issue. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
